data.title: Abhishek post like sparks divorce rumours with Aishwarya
data.meta_description: When attending events with his family, Abhishek Bachchan now enters with his parents instead of his wife, say reports
data.text:
Bollywood's renowned actor Abhishek Bachchan has worried his fans by liking a post on social media related to divorce, which has sparked rumours of a divorce with his wife, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan.

Indian media has been buzzing with rumours of Aishwarya and Abhishek's divorce for the past year because the couple has been seen separately at many events.

When attending events with his family, Abhishek Bachchan now enters with his parents instead of his wife, Aishwarya Rai, and daughter Aaradhya.

Indian media reported that at the wedding of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant, Abhishek Bachchan attended with his parents, Amitabh and Jaya Bachchan, whereas Aishwarya Rai and Aaradhya made a separate appearance.

In addition, during the ceremony, when family photos were being taken, Aishwarya Rai and her daughter Aaradhya were not part of the family photoshoot but the actress had a photo shoot with her daughter on the red carpet.

However, a few such images also surfaced during the event in which Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai were seen talking to each other. After these images, the news of the divorce between the two was dismissed, but now Abhishek's new step has troubled fans.

According to Indian media, Abhishek Bachchan has liked an article on the divorce of Indian woman Henna Khandelwal. The journalist had posted this article on her Instagram handle.

The article about divorce stated that for a long time, couples bound in marriage are now separating, so what is the thing that is forcing them to make this decision?

Among the likes of this post is also the name of Abhishek Bachchan; some fans speculated that Abhishek and Aishwarya Rai have divorced, while some said that the actor is considering divorce.

Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai got married in 2007, and their daughter Aaradhya was born in 2011.

Previously, Bollywood's former golden couple, Salman Khan and Aishwarya Rai, sent fans into a frenzy when a photo of them together at Anant Ambani's wedding surfaced online. The lavish ceremony, hosted by India's wealthiest businessman Mukesh Ambani on July 12, was attended by numerous Bollywood stars and international celebrities.

Aishwarya Rai, accompanied by her daughter Aaradhya Bachchan, was seen posing for photographs, while the rest of the Bachchan family also made a separate appearance. However, it was a viral image of Aishwarya holding Salman Khan's hand, with Salman's sister Arpita Khan Sharma also in the frame, that captured everyone's attention.

The image sparked wild speculation and joy among fans, with many wondering if the two stars were considering rekindling their romance.
